entities.name: VIRTUAL REALITY
entities.description: Technology that simulates real-world environments and scenarios, enhancing learning experiences in education

entities.name: EDUCATION
entities.description: The field of teaching and learning, which can benefit from the integration of virtual reality technology

entities.name: MEDICAL STUDENTS
entities.description: Students who can practice surgical procedures in a virtual operating room, benefiting from immersive learning experiences

entities.name: HISTORY STUDENTS
entities.description: Students who can explore historical landmarks and events through immersive virtual tours, enhancing their understanding of history

entities.name: VIRTUAL OPERATING ROOM
entities.description: A simulated environment where medical students can practice surgical procedures

entities.name: HISTORICAL LANDMARKS
entities.description: Sites of historical significance that can be explored through virtual tours

entities.name: VIRTUAL FIELD TRIPS
entities.description: Educational activities that allow students to visit places virtually, expanding their learning experiences

entities.name: SIMULATIONS
entities.description: Virtual experiences that replicate real-world scenarios, used for educational purposes

entities.name: COLLABORATIONS
entities.description: Virtual interactions and projects that students can engage in, regardless of their physical location

entities.name: SCHOOLS
entities.description: Educational institutions that may need to invest in VR technology to support virtual learning experiences

entities.name: EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS
entities.description: Organizations that provide education and may adopt VR technology

entities.name: VR HEADSETS
entities.description: Devices used to experience virtual reality, becoming more affordable and widespread

entities.name: TEACHERS
entities.description: Educators who need training to effectively integrate virtual reality into their teaching practices

entities.name: INSTRUCTORS
entities.description: Educators who require support to facilitate virtual learning experiences

entities.name: PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS
entities.description: Training and resources provided to teachers to help them integrate VR technology

entities.name: KINESTHETIC LEARNERS
entities.description: Students who benefit from the hands-on and experiential nature of virtual reality, allowing them to learn in a way that suits their needs

entities.name: STUDENTS WITH DISABILITIES
entities.description: Students who can benefit from virtual reality technology, as it can provide alternative learning experiences that accommodate their specific requirements

entities.name: STUDENTS WITH LEARNING DIFFICULTIES
entities.description: Students who can benefit from virtual reality technology, as it can provide alternative learning experiences that accommodate their specific requirements

entities.name: YOUNG CHILDREN
entities.description: A group of students who may be at risk of health and safety issues when using virtual reality devices for extended periods

entities.name: ADOLESCENTS
entities.description: A group of students who may be at risk of health and safety issues when using virtual reality devices for extended periods

entities.name: EDUCATORS
entities.description: Teachers and instructors who need to be trained to effectively integrate virtual reality into their teaching practices

entities.name: POLICYMAKERS
entities.description: Individuals who need to consider the risks and benefits of virtual reality in educational settings and implement guidelines and safeguards
